product_name: Camaro Overall Storm Wetsuit - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're training for a triathlon or catching waves on your paddleboard or kayak, the men's Camaro Overall Storm Wetsuit will help keep you warm while you're in the water. 4/3mm neoprene suit keeps warmth in and allows great range of motion for your arms. 95% water-resistant G-lock zipper in back keeps water from getting in. Double-lined, high-stretch sleeves; single-lined body. Seams are glued and blind stitched. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're training for a triathlon or catching waves on your paddleboard or kayak, the men's Camaro Overall Storm Wetsuit will help keep you warm while you're in the water.
